articles.author: Mike Snider
articles.title: Colachup? Coachup? Pepsi cola ketchup combo latest odd pairing - USA TODAY
articles.description: Pepsi worked with the Culinary Institute of America to make a Pepsi-infused ketchup. You can try it at four Major League Baseball parks on July 4.
articles.content:
Baseball, hot dogs and ketchup made with cola? That's what's coming to the plate at four Major League Baseball parks on July 4, courtesy of Pepsi.
We know Pepsi is not shy when it comes to mashing u… [+2165 chars]
